toggle-shafts-key-tooltip: Key combination to toggle shaft visibility.
force-shafts-tooltip: Force shafts to be always visible.
toggle-highlight-type-key-tooltip: Key combination to toggle highlight type.
highlight-types-tooltip: Types of highlights used (rectangle, image, sprite).
highlight-color-r-tooltip: Adjust the red component of the highlight color (0-255).
highlight-color-g-tooltip: Adjust the green component of the highlight color (0-255).
highlight-color-b-tooltip: Adjust the blue component of the highlight color (0-255).
highlight-color-a-tooltip: Adjust the alpha transparency of the highlight color (0-255).
toggle-tint-key-tooltip: Key combination to toggle stone tint usage.
highlight-image-filename-tooltip: Image file name used for highlight.
cycle-alpha-key-tooltip: Key combination to cycle through alpha transparency levels.
highlight-uses-stone-tint-tooltip: Use stone color for highlight tint.
toggle-node-radar-key-tooltip: Key combination to toggle node radar.
